It provides a small prayer bonus that matches that of a helm of Neitiznot, while retaining the defensive bonuses of a mithril full helm, and is commonly used during slayer tasks that require the use of protection prayers, as the armour reduces the drain of prayer points.

Item ID5574

The initiate sallet is a piece of Temple Knight Armour that requires 20 Defence, 10 Prayer, and completion of the Recruitment Drive quest to equip. It provides a small prayer bonus that matches that of a helm of Neitiznot, while retaining the defensive bonuses of a mithril full helm, and is commonly used during slayer tasks that require the use of protection prayers, as the armour reduces the drain of prayer points.

If lost, another sallet can be bought for 6,000 coins, but is usually much cheaper to buy from the Grand Exchange.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+13+14+11-1+13
 Other bonusesSlot

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The sallet's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -2 to -3.

20 September 2006
(update)
  • The item was renamed from "Initiate helm" to "Initiate sallet".
  • The item's value was increased from 3,000 to 6,000.
17 October 2005
(update)

The item was graphically updated with the release of Wanted!
